Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Naan Isravelin Vamsangalukkellaam Dhevanaayiruppen, Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
2 pattayaththirkuth Thappi, Meendha Janam Vanaandharaththil Irakkam Petradhu; Isravelukku Ilaippaarudhalaik Kattalaiyidappogiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
3 poorvakaalamudhal Karththar Engalukku Dharisanaiyaanaar Enbaai; Aam Anaadhi Snegaththaal Unnai Snegiththen; Aadhalaal Kaaruniyaththaal Unnai Izhuththukkollugiren.
4 isravel Ennum Kannigaiye, Marupadiyum Unnaik Kattuvippen, Nee Kattappaduvaai; Marupadiyum Nee Melavaaththiyaththodum Aadalpaadal Seygiravargalin Kalippulla Koottaththodum Purappaduvaai.
5 marupadiyum Samaariyaavin Malaigalile Dhraatchaththottangalai Naattuvaai; Naattugiravargal Avaigalai Naatti, Adhin Palanai Anubavippaargal.
6 ezhundhirungal, Seeyonil Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththirkup Povom Vaarungal Endru Eppiraayeemin Malaigalilulla Jaamakkaarar Koorunkaalam Varum.

7 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Yaakkobinimiththam Magizhchchiyaai Gembeeriththu, Jaadhigaludaiya Thalaivarinimiththam Aarppariyungal; Saththaththaik Ketkappanni, Thudhiththu: Karththaave, Isravelil Meedhiyaana Umadhu Janaththai Ratchiyum Endru Sollungal.

8 idho, Naan Avargalai Vadadhesaththilirundhu Varappanni, Avargalai Boomiyin Ellaigalilirundhu Koottivaruven; Kurudarum Sappaanigalum, Karppavadhigalum, Pillaith Thaaichchigalunkooda Avargalil Iruppaargal; Magaa Koottamaai Ivvidaththirkuth Thirumbuvaargal.

9 azhugaiyodum Vinnappangalodum Varuvaargal; Avargalai Vazhinadaththuven; Avargalaith Thanneerulla Nadhigalandaikku Idaraadha Semmaiyaana Vazhiyile Nadakkappannuven; Isravelukku Naan Pidhaavaayirukkiren, Eppiraayeem En Seshtapuththiranaayirukkiraan.

10 jaadhigale, Neengal Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kettu, Dhooraththilulla Theevugalil Ariviththu, Isravelai Sidharadiththavar Adhai Serththukkondu, Oru Meyppan Than Mandhaiyaik Kaakkumvannamaaga Adhaik Kaappaar Endru Sollungal.
11 karththar Yaakkobai Meettu, Avanilum Balaththavanudaiya Kaikku Avanai Neengalaakki Viduvikkiraar.

12 avargal Vandhu, Seeyonin Uchchiyile Gembeeriththu, Karththar Arulum Kodhumai, Dhraatcharasam, Enney, Aattukkuttigal, Kandrukkuttigal Enbavaigalaagiya Indha Nanmaigalukkaaga Odivaruvaargal; Avargaludaiya Aaththumaa Neerppaaichchalaana Thottampolirukkum; Avargal Inith Thoindhupovadhillai.

13 appozhudhu Kannigaigalum, Vaalibarum, Mudhiyorunkooda Aanandhakkalippaai Magizhuvaargal; Naan Avargal Dhukkaththai Sandhoshamaaga Maatri, Avargalaith Thetri, Avargal Sanjalam Neenga Avargalai Sandhoshappaduththuven.
14 aasaariyargalin Aaththumaavaik Kozhumaiyaanavaigalinaal Poorippaakkuven; En Janangal Naan Alikkum Nanmaiyinaal Thirupthiyaavaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

15 raamaavile Pulambalum Kasappaana Azhugaiyumaagiya Kookkural Ketkappattadhu; Raagel Than Pillaigalukkaaga Azhudhu, Than Pillaigal Illaadhapadiyaal Avaigalinimiththam Aarudhal Adaiyaadhirukkiraal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

16 nee Azhaadhapadikku Un Saththaththai Adakki, Nee Kanneer Vidaadhapadikku Un Kangalaik Kaaththukkol Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Un Kiriyaikkup Palan Undendru; Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargal Saththuruvin Dhesaththilirundhu Thirumbivaruvaargal.
17 un Mudivaippatri Unakku Nambikkaiyundu; Un Pillaigal Thangal Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbi Varuvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
18 neer Ennai Dhandiththeer, Naan Paniyaadha Maadupol Adikkappatten; Ennaith Thiruppum, Appozhudhu Thiruppappaduven; Neere En Dhevanaagiya Karththar.

19 naan Thirumbinapinbu Manasthaabappattukkondirukkiren, Naan Ennai Arindhukondadharkup Pinbu Vilaavil Adiththukkondirukkiren, Vetki Naanikkondumirukkiren, En Ilavayadhin Nindhaiyai Sumandhu Varugiren Endru Eppiraayeem Dhukkiththup Pulambikkondirukkiradhai Nichchayamaaikketten.

20 eppiraayeem Enakku Arumaiyaana Kumaaran Allavo? Avan Enakkup Piriyamaana Pillaiyallavo? Avanukku Virodhamaaippesinadhu Mudhal Avanai Ninaiththukkonde Irukkiren; Aagaiyaal En Ullam Avanukkaagak Kodhikkiradhu; Avanukku Urukkamaai Iranguven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar

21 unakkuk Kurippadaiyaalangalai Niruththu; Unakkuth Thoongalai Naattu; Nee Nadandha Vazhiyaagiya Paadhaiyinmel Un Manadhai Vai; Isravelaagiya Kumaaraththiye, Thirumbu; Indha Unnudaiya Pattanangalukke Thirumbu.
22 seerkettuppona Kumaaraththiye, Endhamattum Vilagith Thirivaai? Karththar Boomiyile Oru Pudhumaiyai Sirushtippaar, Sthreeyaanaval Purushanai Soozhndhukolluvaal.

23 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Avargal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppumpodhu, Avargal: Needhiyin Vaasasthalame, Parisuththa Parvadhame, Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhikkakkadavarengira Vaarththaiyai Yoodhaavin Dhesaththilum Adhin Pattanangalilum Solluvaargal.
24 adhile Yoodhaavum, Adhanudaiya Ellaap Pattanangalin Manusharum Payiridun Kudigalum, Mandhaigalai Meyththuth Thirigiravargalum Egamaaik Kudiyiruppaargal.
25 naan Vidaaiththa Aaththumaavai Sampooranamadaiyappanni, Thoindha Ellaa Aaththumaavaiyum Nirappuven.
26 idharkaaga Naan Vizhiththuppaarththukkondirukkiren; En Niththirai Enakku Inbamaayirundhadhu.
27 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Isravel Kudumbaththaiyum Yoodhaa Kudumbaththaiyum Manushaviththinaalum, Mirugaviththinaalum Vidhaippen.

28 appozhudhu Naan Pidungavum Idikkavum Nirmoolamaakkavum Azhikkavum Theenguseyyavum Avargalperil Eppadi Jaakkiradhaiyaayirundheno, Appadiye Kattavum Naattavum Avargal Peril Jaakkiradhaiyaayiruppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
29 pidhaakkal Dhraatchakkaaigalaith Thindraargal, Pillaigalin Parkal Koosippoyina Endru Annaatkalil Sollamaattaargal.
30 avanavan Thanthan Akkiramaththinimiththame Saavaan; Endha Manushan Dhraatchakkaaigalaith Thinbaano Avanudaiya Parkale Koosippogum.
31 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Isravel Kudumbaththodum Yoodhaa Kudumbaththodum Pudhu Udanpadikkai Pannuven.

32 naan Avargal Pidhaakkalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththuvarak Kaippidiththa Naalile, Avargalode Pannina Udanpadikkaiyinpadi Alla; Enenil Naan Avargalukku Naayagaraayirundhum, Andha En Udanpadikkaiyai Avargal Meeri Avamaakkippottaargale Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

33 annaatkalukkup Pirpaadu, Naan Isravel Kudumbaththode Pannappogira Udanpadikkaiyaavadhu; Naan En Nyaayappramaanaththai Avargal Ullaththile Vaiththu, Adhai Avargal Irudhayaththile Ezhudhi, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen, Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

34 ini Oruvan Than Ayalaanaiyum, Oruvan Than Sagodharanaiyum Nokki: Karththarai Arindhukol Endru Podhippadhillai; Avargalil Siriyavanmudhal Periyavanmattum, Ellaarum Ennai Arindhukolvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Avargal Akkiramaththai Manniththu, Avargal Paavangalai Ini Ninaiyaadhiruppen.

35 sooriyanaip Pagal Velichchaththukkaagavum Sandhira Natchaththira Niyamangalai Raavelichchaththukkaagavum Kattalaiyittavarum, Alaigal Kondhalikkaththakkadhaaga Samuththiraththaik Kulukkugiravarum, Senaigalin Karththar Ennum Naamamullavarumaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:
36 indha Niyamangal Enakku Munbaaga Illaadhapadikku Ozhindhuponaal, Appozhudhu Isravel Sandhadhiyum Enakku Munbaaga Endraikkum Oru Jaadhiyaayiraadhapadikku Atruppom Endru Karththar Sollugiraar:

37 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Mele Irukkira Vaanangal Alakkappadavum, Keezhe Irukkira Boomiyin Asthibaarangal Aaraayappadavum Koodumaanaal, Naan Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivaraiyum Avargal Seydha Ellaavatrinimiththamum Veruththuviduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
38 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar; Appozhudhu Indha Nagaram, Anaaneyelin Koburamudhal Kodivaasalmattum Karththarukkendru Kattappadum.
39 appuramum Alavunool Adharku Edhiraaik Kaarep Ennum Mettinmel Sendru Kovaadh Puramaaga Sutrippom.

40 predhangalaip Pudhaikkiradhum, Saambalaik Kottugiradhumaana Pallaththaakkanaiththum, Keedharon Vaaikkaalukku Ippaale Kizhakke Irukkira Kudhiraivaasalin Kodimattum Undaana Sagala Nilangalum Karththarukkup Parisuththamaayirukkum; Appuram Adhu Endrendraikkum Pidungappaduvadhumillai Idikkappaduvadhumillai Engiraar.
